general.name: name
general.user_profiles+: publicly visible user profiles on utasuki
general.remove_title: remove this track (doesn't remove every instance of this track)
general.public_title: your profile will be publicly available and listed on the front page
general.track_notes_public_title: your track notes will be publicly available for everyone to read
general.border_radius_title: enable/disable the rounded corners on windows, buttons, images e.t.c.

error.connection_refused: connection to the server could not be established
error.connection_timeout: request to the server timed out
error.add_track_fields_not_specified: the required fields for adding a track were not specified correctly
error.forbidden:
you do not have permission to do that

are you logged in?
error.login_general: one or both fields are incorrect
error.user_email_exists: a user with that email already exists
error.track_already_added: track already added on that date

warning.no_tracks_year: user does not have any tracks for the specified year
warning.too_many_login_attempts: too many login attempts have been made, try again later
warning.too_many_registrations: too many registrations/login attempts have been made, try again later

info.user_no_tracks: user does not have any tracks
info.self_no_tracks: you have not added any tracks yet

dialog.delete:
are you sure you want to delete:
{thing}?

about.p1: This site is meant to be a place where you can document your favourite music for every month.
about.p3: Because if you're like me and listen to A LOT of music, you'll probably have multiple favourite tracks/songs, and I want to store and present that data in a nice way.
about.p4: The site is under development and a lot of features are not yet implemented, but the core features like creating an account, logging in and adding/editing tracks are.
about.p5: You can follow the development on GitHub.
about.pfp: (profile picture was drawn by エメさん, link to the artwork can be found on pixiv)
